thread.title: Orlando Weather Forecast: March 22, 2024 | Flipboard

author: WOFL
title: Orlando Weather Forecast: March 22, 2024 | Flipboard
text: Friday has been declared a FOX 35 Weather Impact Day for Central Florida due to the waves of showers and storms that are anticipated to affect the region.
